name: Rhythm Nights
description:
Rhythm Nights strives to open a gateway to the 4th dimensional rhythm universe.

Experience and engage with your music like never before.

// Features

// Unique Rhythm game play utilizing various game mechanics.

// 6 Tracks by Rainbow Xylophone

// Integrated ability to import and accurately analyze YOUR OWN MUSIC for Game play.

// Four levels of difficulty appropriate for everyone.

// An adaptive training level to increase everyone's rhythm awareness to the MAX
